activities: Wellness & Prevention, Inc. may receive personal information in various forms relating to personnel, including prospective and former employees. These data may be transferred from the EU to the US and are used to carry out the company’s human resource function. Please contact us with any questions about the way in which we process personal data. Employees and former employees of Wellness & Prevention, Inc. should contact us at: Johnson & Johnson Consumer Companies, Inc., Chief Compliance Officer, 908.874.2450, Fax: 908.874.2477, Consumer_Privacy@its.jnj.com.
